clinical_study.brief_title: Single Dose Escalation and Multiple Dose Escalation Trial of an Oral Formulation of MRX-4
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo Controlled Three-Part Phase 1 Study of the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Food Effect of MRX 4 Administered Orally to Healthy Volunteers in Single Ascending and Multiple Ascending Dose Cohorts, and to Evaluate Drug Interactions With Omeprazole

brief_summary.textblock:
A phase one study of the safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics of a new oxazolidinone antibiotic. Cohorts of healthy adults (female and male) will participate in:
single dose escalation study of increasing doses of MRX-4 given by mouth others will participate in multiple dose escalation cohorts of MRX-4 given twice daily by mouth.
other cohorts of subjects will participate in the study to evaluate the impact of concomitant food or Omeprazole on safety, tolerability and pharmacokinetics of MRX-4

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Safety of single and multiple ascending doses of MRX-4
primary_outcome.time_frame: Screening through end of study visit on Day 7 (Part 1), Day 17 (Part II) and Day 14 (Part III)
primary_outcome.description: Summary of number of subjects with changes in vital signs, physical examinations, clinical lab data, ECG parameters and adverse events

primary_outcome.measure: Summary of concentration time data for MRX-4 and its metabolites
primary_outcome.description: Concentration time data for MRX-4 and its metabolites in blood and urine

secondary_outcome.measure: Summary of the plasma concentration teim data for MRX-4 under fed or fasted conditions
secondary_outcome.description: Concentration time data for MRX-4 and its metabolites in blood and urine under fed and fasted conditions

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety of MRX-4 co-administered with omeprazole
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Screening through end of study on Day 14
secondary_outcome.description: Summary of the number of subjects with changes in vital signs, physical examinations, clinical lab data, ecg parameters and adverse events

secondary_outcome.measure: Summary of the plasma concentration time data for MRX-4 co-administered with omeprazole
secondary_outcome.description: Concentation time data for MRX-4 and its metabolites in blood and urine with and without omeprazole

arm_group.description: Single escalating oral doses of MRX-4 from 250 mg to 3000 mg
Twice daily escalating oral doses of MRX-4 for 10 days: 500 mg, 750 mg, 1000 mg, and 1500 mg
Impact of concomitant food or omeprazole on the pharmacokinetics of oral MRX-4.
Single oral doses of placebo to match MRX-4
Multiple oral doses of placebo given twice daily for 10 days to match MRX-4
Oral placebo given on Day 1, Day 7 to match MRX-4 dosing with omeprazole

intervention.description: Oral single escalating doses of MRX-4
Multiple ascending doses of MRX-4 given twice daily for 10 days
MRX-4 given orally on Day 1 and Day 7, co-administered with omeprazole on Day 3 through Day 7
Single doses of placebo to match MRX-4
Oral placebo given twice daily for 10 days to match the oral MRX-4
Placebo given orally on Day 1 and Day 7, co-administered with omeprazole on Day 3 through Day 7

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy subjects
Exclusion Criteria:
- Underlying hepatic, renal, metabolic, hematologic, cardiovascular, or immunologic disorder
